previewArticle.title: Toronto FC vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Toronto FC hosts a must-win game against Montreal Impact at BMO Field in Toronto.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Toronto FC vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Chas Marsden
timelineItems.text: Come on people, are we really gonna let the Impact fans run our house? Show your support. Let's get loud! #TFClive #LOUDER

timelineItems.name: josh rubin
timelineItems.text: Lots of dark clouds at BMO Field today. And that's just the weather. #tfc #mls #tfclive

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: C'est le temps de briser des rêves de séries! Bon match! #TORvMTL #IMFClive Let's crush some playoff dreams!

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Canada is the 5th-happiest nation on the planet. They’d be higher if TFC fans didn’t bring the average down. #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Le passage par l'axe, principale menace torontoise face à Montréal #TORvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Andres Romero skies early chance

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: Very uncool from Camara pushing a teammate away like that, let alone it being the captain. Lack of respect. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Dilly Duka.
Eric Miller (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jackson (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Brian
timelineItems.text: "Push to the playoffs here" being trolled by our own billboards #TFC #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: How does a simple ball out of the back turn into a counterattack against TFC?

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: TFC quite slow in the build-up. Making defending easy for Montreal so far. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Les partisans de #IMFC sont tellement actifs que la tribune de presse a un mouvement de va et vient comme sur un bateau.

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: Would romero do that to Divaio? Jackmac will have to start gesticulating or he'll never get a pass #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Deflection takes Dilly Duka’s shot wide

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Grob
timelineItems.text: I'm just now seeing no Bradley or Dafoe for TFC. It just never stops for Toronto. #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: josh rubin
timelineItems.text: Montreal showing some speed up front, but so far, neither side looking very dangerous. #tfc #tfclive #mls

timelineItems.name: Sonja Cori Missio
timelineItems.text: I hate everything from Montreal! *eats BMO poutine* #TFCLIVE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrés Romero.

timelineItems.name: Miki Turner
timelineItems.text: The loneliest man in the world. #TORvMTL http://t.co/UQ40SOgX3G

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Steven Caldwell.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Early analysis: #TFC and #IMFC look like a pair of teams below the red line.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Duka's pass. Woof.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Don't ignore the fact TFC is playing into a very, very stiff wind. It's difficult. No surprised IMFC enjoying more possession.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Très bon tempo en début de match. Intensité au rendez-vous #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 0. Warren Creavalle (Toronto FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Warren Creavalle gives Toronto early lead

timelineItems.name: Joshua Lo
timelineItems.text: With the type of play I've seen so far, it feels like Montreal are in sixth and Toronto in tenth place. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Myles Gooding
timelineItems.text: Last game of the regular season #torontoFC vs Montreal Impact ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Nick B
timelineItems.text: @torontofc maybe not the smartest idea putting visiting fans so close to a supporters section. #TFClive http://t.co/MBITLdsGvo

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Luke Moore (Toronto FC) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jackson with a headed pass.
Match ends, Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Watchlevski Redsulov
timelineItems.text: can we give toledo a red? how do you let a game get to this point? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Miguel Angelo
timelineItems.text: Bloody big embarrassment. @torontofc officially eliminated from playoff contention. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: #TFC imploding in the onnly way they could: drawing a 10-men last place MLS team #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Petros Mascia
timelineItems.text: Hey Toronto FC you may have better players but the impact still have more playoff appearances #IMFC #TSN

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @impactmontreal eliminates @torontofc from playoff contention with 1-1 tie: http://t.co/KNWLKnMQD9 #TORvMTL http://t.co/KBiJxTAOmS

timelineItems.name: Michael Leach
timelineItems.text: #Crew96, you're in! #TFC is out with the draw. One rival knocks the reds out to send another rival to the playoffs, fitting. #TFCLive #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Toronto FC face their biggest match of the season against rival Montreal Impact in a game that decides the Reds postseason fate.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Toronto FC vs. Montreal Impact | October 18, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #TFC’s playoff hopes end for 8th straight year in wild Canadian clash. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/86CksSASyf #TORvMTL http://t.co/RPTp3kCT4U

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Luke Moore (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Luke Moore’s shot deflected high

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: That's brilliant from Creavalle. Absolutely brilliant with the side foot out of the air. $

timelineItems.name: DiD
timelineItems.text: Camara spectateur sur le but réveille Hassoun!! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: George
timelineItems.text: Cool finish. Very cool finish. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Alexandre Roy
timelineItems.text: Ridicule #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Luke Moore (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: Camara better score our 1st corner goal to make us forget that #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sonja Cori Missio
timelineItems.text: Gooooooooal! Even my dad is getting into the spirit! #tfclive pic: http://t.co/jnbPkLdisK

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Trop de temps pour Crevalle là-dessus. Camara ne semblait pas s'attendre à un tir #IMFC #TFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Je vous offre tout de suite la citation de Klopas: We gave a goal out of nothing. Prenez ça en note. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jackson (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Gilberto.
Attempt missed. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Happy this could be TFC's final home game so I don't have to see people analyze and whine about BMO attendance.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Eric Miller.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Tumilty
timelineItems.text: .@torontofc What's French for I can't hear you? #TFClive http://t.co/4AgSlErOzU

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: McInerney’s shot from distance skips wide

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Vachon
timelineItems.text: L'#IMFC me désespère, mais solidement...

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Eric Miller.

timelineItems.name: ImpactSoccer.com
timelineItems.text: La partie “Faite comme chez vous” du plan de match de @patleduc15 semble parfaitement exécutée par... les supporters d'#IMFC

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: This isn't 2008, folks. BMO is going to be half-full or 2/3 full until team wins consistently. Why are you surprised?

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Patrice Bernier.
Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: katie hunter ∞
timelineItems.text: TFC game w/ @jamstevo @7cheech7 & @apallotts -- 🍁⚽️#TorontoFC

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Jackson occasionally reaching back at his right glute/ham - either feeling something or checking his wallet. #TORvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Gilberto (Toronto FC) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jackson.

timelineItems.name: Devang Desai
timelineItems.text: Caldwell has been fantastic. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Mark In Victoria
timelineItems.text: If we're here for #TFC's funeral, it only seems appropriate that Baldomero Toledo is officiating. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Eric
timelineItems.text: A entendre @ultrasmontreal aussi fort a tv, on se croirait a domicile. Bravo a ceux qui ont fait le voyage !! #IMFC #Toronoto #MLS

timelineItems.name: josh rubin
timelineItems.text: Anything but a victory over Montreal and Toronto FC is out of the playoffs. Again. #tfc #tfclive #mls

timelineItems.name: Joshua Lo
timelineItems.text: I smell a red card and/or a penalty in this game. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Le jeu au sol, principale menace montréalaise à Toronto #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Jack Mac doit faire un passage sur la touche. Il a mis la chaussure gauche sur son pied droit et inversement. #IMFC #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Guillaume Scopelleti
timelineItems.text: J'espère qu'il y a un plan pour remplacer Di Vaio l'an prochain pcq je suis inquiet avec Jack Mac #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact).
Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Bruce Harding
timelineItems.text: Wow perfect pass by Creavalle, someone HAS to be on the end of that. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: seeing some poor defending at both ends - chances aplenty but finishing, aside from Creavalle, has been abysmal #TORvMTL #MLS #TFC #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Philip Harmeling
timelineItems.text: On pourrait aussi laisser des chaises aux défenseurs si ils préfèrent s'assoir. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Emily McCutcheon
timelineItems.text: That black and blue mass is all dedicated Montreal fans at the last TFC home game of the season! #TFClive http://t.co/SYT998zpc3

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Klopas : "On doit être meilleurs avec le ballon en milieu de terrain et dans le dernier tiers" #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luke Moore (Toronto FC).
Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: YMG
timelineItems.text: Quel est ce jeu bizzare que joue l'#IMFC ? Soccer?

timelineItems.name: Jonathan St-Jean
timelineItems.text: Hey @AndreHainault ça te tente pas de venir solidifier notre défensive un peu?? #imfc

timelineItems.name: David & Pam
timelineItems.text: Anyone else think TFC are playing better without Michael Bradley, more of a team effect #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Matteo Ferrari.
Luke Moore (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Luke Moore (Toronto FC) header from the center of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mark Bloom with a cross.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE:  Luke Moore’s header punched away by Ferrari

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Luke Moore (Toronto FC) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mark Bloom with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Harguindey
timelineItems.text: On dirait que Jack Mac joue en gougounes aujourd'hui. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).
Justin Morrow (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: HEY LES GARS Y'A UN DEUXIEME POTEAU A COUVRIR, REVEILLEZ-VOUS ! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Les réservistes s'échauffent #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: fantastic saving header from Ferrari off Moore - #TFC striker probably feels he should have 2 goals by now #TORvMTL #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: J.R.
timelineItems.text: #TFC looking decent today, is that coz they're playing Montreal or coz no Bradley & Defoe? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Beaucoup de présence dans le petit rectangle des joueurs de Toronto, mais pas toujours au bon moment #TORvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 1. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the center of the box to the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Felipe Martins equalizes for Impact

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Les supporters montréalais scandent le nom de Di Vaio #TORvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Hassoun Camara sees an early yellow

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Empty seats at BMO are even sadder when you know people paid for those seats and just decided to do something else. #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Mike Crampton
timelineItems.text: Doneil Henry just stopped a goal-scoring opportunity that no one will remember when he gives away a PK later. Classic #TFClive.

timelineItems.comment: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Collen Warner (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: That is a fantastic dance by Felipe. Goal not rubbish either.

timelineItems.name: TFC reporter
timelineItems.text: Someone remind me again why Creavalle is supposedly a RB? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: DrRetro
timelineItems.text: Would someone PLEASE shut down the little man with the silly moustache? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Fantastic strike, but where is everybody? How does one of Oso/Warner not recover into that space at the top of the circle? Loads of time.

timelineItems.name: Lizzi
timelineItems.text: And the 1200 fans go wild!! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Frederic Lord
timelineItems.text: Ballon "délicieux" de Bernier. Une danse toute aussi délicieuse de Felipe #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: 1-1. Well worked move from #IMFC. Felipe finishes nicely from top of the box. TFC leave that space open quite often don't they? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: #teamjimi
timelineItems.text: @bgnewf that about sums it up. #TFClive http://t.co/zHvn9DKaUl

timelineItems.name: Karim Djazairi
timelineItems.text: En dirait que la méthode Klopas a fonctionné en envoyant les remplaçants s'échauffer pour stimuler ses joueurs! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: At least Felipe realizes its a rivalry game. Taunting the fans is a must, to be fair. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Olivier Morneau
timelineItems.text: Felipe > Piatti #troll #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Doneil Henry (Toronto FC).
Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: Lovely first-time finish from Creavalle opened the scoring: http://t.co/29DePvGVif #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dave Smith
timelineItems.text: These Montreal fans know #IMFC are dead last, right? #TFC had a disappointing season, but we're not the worst. TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: 4e officiel à Klopas : "Get in the box Frank !" #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Joshua Lo
timelineItems.text: Henry doesn't need to do that. #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Josiah Norman
timelineItems.text: Get in there boys. Crush those Toronto play-off hopes. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dance it out, Felipe. #TORvMTL http://t.co/e0t9QDPAR0

timelineItems.name: Marsha Duggan
timelineItems.text: You guys understand what "must win" means right?? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: paolonow
timelineItems.text: Watching the #imfc play #tfc with a couple of Toronto fans #itscold #guyeatingpoutine

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Toronto FC 1, Montreal Impact 1.
Justin Morrow (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).
Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Patrice Bernier.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Felipe hammers home the equalizer for @impactmontreal: http://t.co/vZ5m2JfJ1j #TORvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Evan Bush (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gilberto (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Scorpio
timelineItems.text: Still can't believe we traded Issey for Warner. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Paul Mariner is in the suites today. Here on "vacation".

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Damn, it's windy. Collen Warner had hair when this game started, y'know.

timelineItems.name: Emily W
timelineItems.text: Lots of security around the Montreal section. #goodidea #TFClive http://t.co/tatGIcSWot

timelineItems.name: Patrick Marsolais
timelineItems.text: Les clubs canadiens peinent à faire les séries en MLS. C'est pareil dans la LNH et dans la MLB. Une chance qu'il y a la LCF... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Renaldo Scopelleti
timelineItems.text: C'est tu juste moi qui pense que Jack Mack ne génère pas grand chose en attaque #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Jackson (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eric Miller (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.desc: Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the center of the box. Assisted by Felipe Martins with a through ball.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: McInerney’s shot deflected off the bar

timelineItems.name: Rudi Schuller
timelineItems.text: How did Toledo allow a player to fully grab the ball without stopping play?? #TORvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Felipe Martins with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Full marks to IMFC supporters today. Their club has been terrible this season. But they're up for this one. @impactmontreal

timelineItems.desc: Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Matteo Ferrari is booked

timelineItems.comment: Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Richard Jaffa
timelineItems.text: McInerney surely has to score there - but he hits the bar from just a few yards out. Classy ball to him from Felipe. #TORvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Jaune à Ferrari, il manquera le dernier match de la saison samedi prochain. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Le poteau ne me dérange pas. L'enchaînement Duka-Miller-Felipe et l'appel de McInerney: Superbe #imfc #tfc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Doneil Henry (Toronto FC).
Eric Miller (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Raphaël Larocque-Cyr
timelineItems.text: Est-ce le dernier match de Ferrari avec #IMFC? Suspendu prochain match...

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: De Rosario set to come in for TFC.

timelineItems.name: Marsha Duggan
timelineItems.text: Does anyone have the stats on how many saves Bendik made this season & how many saves the crossbar made? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: It seems like every time someone even whispered the word "important match" around Toronto FC the team loses. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: michael oliphant
timelineItems.text: Appalling service at BMO Field today. 20 minutes in line and never got served. Now I know how our forwards feel. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Richard Jaffa
timelineItems.text: This could be the final appearance at BMO Field for legend @dwaynederosario and it would be fitting if he got the winner. #TORvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Luke Moore (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Jecy
timelineItems.text: #IMFC dommage probablement les dernières minutes de Ferrari avec IMFC.. Sinon contre NYRB en CONCACAF

timelineItems.comment: Steven Caldwell (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Plancher Qui Craque
timelineItems.text: Que de maladresses en attaque... #IMFC #TORvsMTL

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Onzième carton pour Camara. Pas le plus mérité. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Le fameux tacle glissé de Camara... #trademark #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Hassoun Camara with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Peter Rybar
timelineItems.text: Saturday afternoon at BMO Field #TorontoFC #football

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Ca serait bien se voir le 23e joueur #imfc essayait un CF direct

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: I'm liking jackmac attacks. Too bad we lost the JackMapp attack #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Morrow has been excellent today. He's not spectacular. He's not overly vocal. Head down, does his job, has provided good service today.

timelineItems.comment: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonathan Osorio (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Tierney
timelineItems.text: Can De Rosario please just score the winner so we have at least one nice thing this season. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Karim Djazairi
timelineItems.text: La rencontre est trés intensive en ce début de seconde période. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: June
timelineItems.text: #TorontoFC final home game against the #MontrealImpact with @jbshewaga. Conflicted Loyalties But Reppin Toronto 😊 #GoTorontoGo #TFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jack McInerney.

timelineItems.name: Frederic Lord
timelineItems.text: Je lance ça comme ça: deux fois aujourd'hui Jack Mac aurait peut-être du tomber dans la surface... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: A. Ménard
timelineItems.text: Est-ce qu'on va voir Piatti pour un dernier match cette année à Montréal? Nacho ferait exploser le jeu en ce moment! #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: On ne dirait pas que c'est l'équipe en rouge qui se bat pour sa survie en ce moment. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Jackson.

timelineItems.name: Mike Crampton
timelineItems.text: Bekker's gonna help with midfield imbalance? In what universe? #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Josiah Norman
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio on and keep playing like this, would be 5-1 in no time #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Aucune équipe n'est capable de garder le ballon #TORvMTL
